nodes.bodyText:
what is the goal of this error message?

to inform the user that they cannot add more than one SameSite attribute value to an existing cookie name
or
to inform the user that the cookie name they are trying to add already exists and that a duplicate cannot be added.

What causes the error- the duplicate cookie name or the SameSite attribute value?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,16 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping=CWWWC0002W: No servlet definition is found for the {0} servlet name in the {1} filter mapping.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.explanation=The servlet name is used in filter mapping, but its definition has not been defined.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.useraction=Define the servlet which is used in the servlet name filter mapping.
+
+# {0} Cookie name that has conflict SameSite attribute
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A duplicate cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.

nodes.bodyText:
is the problem the cookie name or the attribute? If it's the attribute, then is it necessary top specify the cookie name as "duplicate"? It's difficult to tell where the error is. Would it also be correct to say
"A {0} cookie name with the {1} SameSite attribute value already exists.  "
?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,16 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping=CWWWC0002W: No servlet definition is found for the {0} servlet name in the {1} filter mapping.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.explanation=The servlet name is used in filter mapping, but its definition has not been defined.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.useraction=Define the servlet which is used in the servlet name filter mapping.
+
+# {0} Cookie name that has conflict SameSite attribute
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A duplicate cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names and values for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists. 
+
+duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A duplicate cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] was found previously.  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.

nodes.bodyText:
change
Too many wildcard cookie name configured for SameSite attribute.  No attribute will be added for any cookie.
to
Too many wildcard cookie names are configured for multiple SameSite attributes.  No attributes are added for any cookie.

nodes.bodyText:
change
Too many wildcard cookie name configured for multiple SameSite attribute.  There should be maxinum one wildcard cookie name configured for SameSite attribute.
to
Too many wildcard cookie names are configured for multiple SameSite attributes. You cannot configure more than one wildcard cookie name for each SameSite attribute.

nodes.bodyText:
change
Review the deployment decriptor and limit to one wildcard cookie name for SameSite attribute.
to
Review the deployment descriptor configuration and make sure each SameSite attribute has only one wildcard cookie name.

nodes.bodyText:
ok
change
A duplicate cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] was found previously.  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
to
The {0} cookie name is a duplicate.  No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
